name: Lost (itch) (HawKyre)
description:
DISCLAIMER: YOU CAN JUMP AS MANY TIMES AS YOU WISH IF YOU TIME THE JUMPS AT ITS HIGHEST POINT.

Your soul has left you. You’re lost, or so everyone says. After losing everything you cared about in your life, you wake up from a nightmare and decide you can’t live like this anymore. Even though you aren’t convinced you’ll find yourself at first, you keep pushing. Will you ever find that soul that used to fill you at the end of the journey? Or is it going to be a meaningless waste of time? There’s only one way of finding out: trying. And you’re just determined enough to do it.

Music by RockWizard
